about_the_game:
Death is not the end. But the Nether may be yours.

You have died. Your soul, battered, bruised and shattered into pieces, awakes in the Nether, a vast land consumed and transformed by sin and inhabited by spirits and monsters alike. Your only solace: the beam of blue light right in the center of the Nether, said to make whoever reaches it whole again. To make it, you’ll have to build a powerful deck, fight, explore, outwit and barter - and piece yourself together bit by bit.

New strategic depths

Plan ahead with the timeline, a unique concept in the deckbuilding genre. Queue your cards to create new combinations, unleash a rapid onslaught of attacks all at once, or modify cards you’ve already placed in the timeline.

Adapt to any challenge

Change your active sin as you please, feed the different aspects of your soul and experiment with distinct play styles. Do you keep yourself in balance or will you let one sin dwarf all others? Reign with Pride, outwit with Envy, conquer with Wrath, devour with Gluttony - the possibilities are endless.

Stand alone or fight together

Team up with a friend or stranger to support each other and increase your chance of victory, or challenge other players to a duel, testing the full potential of your deck. Play Nether Spirits in PvE, co-op, 1v1 or 2v2 PvP mode - anytime, anywhere.

Uncover ancient secrets

Travel the vast expanse of the Nether and discover its dark history. Explore age-old ruins in search of lore and treasure, meet compelling characters and help them on their way, or venture into hostile forests thick with fog and mystery - there is no wrong path, only your own.

content_descriptors.notes: Mythological creatures are depicted that may show some slight nudity or have slightly horror-like features.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Final requirements are subject to change
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Mend your shattered soul in Nether Spirits, a tactical roguelike deckbuilder set in a dark, fantastical afterlife corrupted by sin. Choose from seven distinct classes, explore a vast world, and fight your way to salvation - alone, with friends, or in PvP!
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
